author: dion
msg: Patch to provide dist and clean targets as required by Jakarta Commons projects.
Provided by Martin van den Bemt

author: plynch
msg: o Attempted to make the Maven header more concise, remove redundancy in the console output, and add some ascii art that may or may not facilitate boos and hisses
o vertically aligned the goal description output assuming a console of 80 char width, which I believe is standard
o vertically aligned the plugin descriptions, dynamically based on plugin name length
Just some stuff I had lying around. Besides I discovered the BreakIterator class.
Need to templatize the maven version constant, though I hope everyone sees this as an improvement.
